name: Moby
tagline: The Moby rigid body dynamics simulator
body:
### Features (current and slated)
### Features (current and slated)
| Feature  | Projected availability |
|---|---|
| Independent coordinate representation  | **current**  |
| Jacobian computations  | **current**  |
| Implicit joint constraints (for bodies with kinematic loops)  | Fall 2015  |
| Projected constraint stabilization  | Fall 2015  |
|   |   |
|   |   |
| Full unit tests  |   |

### Collision primitives supported
|   | Sphere | Box | Cylinder | Plane | Cone | Convex polyhedron |
|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|
| Sphere | • | • | | •| | Fall 2015 | 
| Box | • | Fall 2015 | | | | Fall 2015 | 
| Cylinder | • | | | | | |
| Cone | | | | | | |
| Convex polyhedron | Fall 2015 | Fall 2015 | | | | Fall 2015 |
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
